title: Hextech rimandati?!
body:
Questo è quello che si legge nella patch in NA
"First off, we'll quickly mention we're aware of a bug where key fragments aren't dropping after matchmade Treeline or ARAM wins. Fixing that is on our list of things that need to be done before we can consider Hextech Crafting fully launched, and we're working on a solution for an upcoming patch."
(però poi aggiungono la skin di anni...babbeh...)
Sono molto sad in questo momento... cavolo e io che avevo già caricato RP...uff...

replies.body:
Nope, avevano trovato dei bug nella versione na, ma il sistema dovrebbe essere operativo per giovedì-venerdì:

>In a reddit thread inquiring about the release status of Hextech Crafting for EU, Mirross noted they are still looking to release it later this week after 6.6 goes to live: 
"We're planning to go this week, hopefully a day or so after this week's patch."
He continued, noting that this should be for all servers who do not have crafting at the moment:
"Hopefully all regions, except Korea where we have some additional requirements"

>As for why they chose to do staggered releases for Hextech release, Chager shared:
"We've been evaluating loot in TR and more recently NA to make sure everything is working correctly and there are no major issues before rolling Hextech crafting out to the other Riot Regions. (We were able to catch a few bugs on NA that we just got fixed that were some major headaches we want other regions to avoid) 
It's a large system that connects to a lot of other parts within League, and we want to make sure we push it out responsibly. We do have plans to roll out soon (TM). 
-Chager"
Non è scritto da nessuna parte che lo rimandino, dicono solo che per considerare il sistema pienamente attivo e funzionante devono prima risolvere quel problema, nulla che accenni a ritardi
Per risolvere il problema potrebbe volerci del tempo, comunque da quello che ha detto Chager su Reddit non è posticipato...
